attributes.action: stop M.P's giving themselves enormous annual pay increases and give hard working prison officers a decent pay increase and to stop offering them a zero % pay increase
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government seem to have forgotten about the hard working prison staff in this country and continually offer a pay rise of 1.6% or less which when inflation is taken into consideration is actually a pay cut, where as M.P's want to give themselves a 40% rise. Fair.........I think not.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
